Disco

public Disco(LightBulb b1,
             LightBulb b2,

Constructor of the Disco which is receives 4 light bulbs. Assumes the given bulbs are not null.

Parameters:
b1 - The first light bulb.
b2 - The second light bulb.
b3 - The third light bulb.
b4 - The forth light bulb.
